PartyFinclAssetAddlOwner.name: PartyFinclAssetAddlOwner
PartyFinclAssetAddlOwner.description: Represents an additional owner of a financial asset.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the additional owner.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the additional owner.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The unique identifier of the party asset additional owner.

OwnershipSharePercent.description: The percentage of the asset ownership between the primary and additional owner.

PartyFinancialAssetId.description: The asset associated with the additional owner.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the record in an external system.
